channel.title: People on Eduard Roccatello's GIS blog
channel.description: Recent content in People on Eduard Roccatello's GIS blog

item.title: Why are soft skills more important than technical skills?
item.description: My perspective on what really counts when you are approaching a new job, or you are choosing a new person to hire in your staff.

item.title: What's wrong with hiring new ICT people, especially in SMEs
item.description: I wanted to write this as a rant, but I think it is a better idea to explain what is the source of my problem, trying to keep a constructive approach to the subject.
